casebody.data:
Tuesday, February 5, 2002

MOTION DOCKET

01-446. Nitchman v. Nationwide Mut. Fire Ins. Co.

Lorain App. No. 99CA007506. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Lorain County. Upon consideration of the motion of amicus curiae, Ohio Academy of Trial Lawyers, to participate in oral argument scheduled for February 6, 2002,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion to participate in oral argument be, and hereby is, granted, and amicus curiae shall share the time allotted to appellant.
